text: ve to chaahate hai ki jis prakaar ve svayan adharmee hai, usee prakaar tum bhee adharmee banakar un jaise ho jao; to tum unamen se apane mitr na banao, jab tak ki ve allaah ke maarg mein gharabaar na chhode. phir yadi ve isase peeth pheren to unhen pakado, aur unhen qatl karo jahaan kahee bhee unhen pao - to unamen se kisee ko na apana mitr banaana aur na sahaayak
